name: Girls' Night in Heels
description: Dares and questions about love, beauty, and secrets between girlfriends. What happens here stays between us girls!

dares.title: First Date Story
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell us about the funniest date you’ve ever been on.

dares.title: Fashion Verdict
dares.action: ${c_player}, rate ${r_player}’s outfit and give her one fashion tip.

dares.title: Secret Crush
dares.action: ${c_player}, confess who your secret crush was.

dares.title: Beauty or Comfort
dares.action: ${c_player}, choose — heels all day or go to a date with no makeup?

dares.title: Secret Makeup
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s one beauty product you secretly love but never admit?

dares.title: Favorite Scent
dares.action: ${c_player}, which perfume scent do your friends associate with you?

dares.title: Beauty Recipe
dares.action: ${c_player}, share your weirdest beauty trick.

dares.title: Celebrity Date
dares.action: ${c_player}, name a celebrity you’d love to go on a date with.

dares.title: Wardrobe Malfunction
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s your most awkward clothing moment?

dares.title: Perfect Day
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe your perfect girls’ day out.

dares.title: Best Dressed
dares.action: ${c_player}, honestly say who looks best tonight.

dares.title: First Date Fear
dares.action: ${c_player}, what secretly scares you the most on a first date?

dares.title: Dress Color No-No
dares.action: ${c_player}, what color would you never wear and why?

dares.title: Weird Gift
dares.action: ${c_player}, share the weirdest gift you’ve ever received.

dares.title: Role Model Friend
dares.action: ${c_player}, what habit of ${r_player} do you secretly wish you had?

dares.title: Dream Dress
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe your dream dress.

dares.title: Romantic Movie Moment
dares.action: ${c_player}, which romantic movie made you cry?

dares.title: Love Fortune
dares.action: ${c_player}, make a love prediction for ${r_player}.

dares.title: Compliment Time
dares.action: ${c_player}, give a compliment to each friend at the table.

dares.title: First Kiss
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell us about your first kiss.

dares.title: Hidden Hobby
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s one hobby no one knows you have?

dares.title: Inner Beauty
dares.action: ${c_player}, what makes a woman beautiful beyond her looks?

dares.title: Go-To Accessory
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s one accessory you always wear and why?

dares.title: Forbidden Dessert
dares.action: ${c_player}, what dessert would you break your diet for?

dares.title: Little Black Dress
dares.action: ${c_player}, where would you wear your perfect little black dress?

dares.title: Dream Heels
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe the shoes that make you feel like royalty.

dares.title: Friendly Envy
dares.action: ${c_player}, what do you genuinely admire about ${r_player}?

dares.title: Selfie Pro
dares.action: ${c_player}, show how you take the perfect selfie.

dares.title: Sweet Gesture
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s a gesture from a guy that melts your heart?

dares.title: Perfect Nails
dares.action: ${c_player}, what nail style do you consider most stylish?

dares.title: Weirdest Diet
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell us the weirdest diet you’ve tried.

dares.title: Slim Secret
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s your top trick for staying in shape?

dares.title: Secret Influencer
dares.action: ${c_player}, who’s the influencer you follow secretly?

dares.title: Unforgettable Compliment
dares.action: ${c_player}, what compliment stuck with you forever?

dares.title: Expert Friend
dares.action: ${c_player}, what do your friends consider you an expert in?

dares.title: Heels or Sneakers
dares.action: ${c_player}, what would you wear on a date — heels or sneakers?

dares.title: Hidden Talent
dares.action: ${c_player}, what secret talent do you have?

dares.title: Favorite Show
dares.action: ${c_player}, what show can you watch on repeat forever?

dares.title: Perfect Morning
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe your perfect morning.

dares.title: Heel Fail
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell us about a time you hilariously fell in heels.

dares.title: 1-Minute Makeup
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe your one-minute makeup routine.

dares.title: Lipstick Check
dares.action: ${c_player}, what color lipstick is in your bag right now?

dares.title: Friend in Need
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell a story when a friend saved your day.

dares.title: 3AM Call
dares.action: ${c_player}, which friend would you call first at 3 a.m.?

dares.title: Beauty Secret Swap
dares.action: Each girl shares one weird beauty hack. Can’t name one? You drink!

dares.title: Group Selfie
dares.action: Take a group selfie with your funniest face. Refuse? You drink!

dares.title: Compliment Chain
dares.action: Each girl compliments the one to her right. Stumble? You drink!

dares.title: Top Accessory
dares.action: Everyone shows their favorite accessory. The least-voted one drinks!

dares.title: Lip Color Match
dares.action: Say your favorite lipstick color at the same time. Matches drink together!

dares.title: Photo Pose-Off
dares.action: Everyone strikes their best photo pose. First to laugh — drinks!

dares.title: Self-Love Shout
dares.action: Everyone shouts ‘I love myself!’ at once. Quietest voice drinks!

dares.title: Nail Check
dares.action: Everyone shows their nails. No manicure? You drink!

dares.title: Heels Dance-Off
dares.action: Dance in heels for 15 seconds. First to stop — drinks!

dares.title: Showtime Picks
dares.action: Say your favorite show all at once. If it’s unique — assign a drink!

dares.title: Girlfriend Fortune
dares.action: Predict what’s coming this year for the girl on your right. Can’t do it? Drink!

dares.title: Shoe Showdown
dares.action: Everyone shows their shoes. Simplest pair — drinks!

dares.title: Truth or Bluff
dares.action: Tell a short story. Others guess if it’s true or not. Wrong guess — drink!

dares.title: Sing Your Favorite
dares.action: Everyone hums their favorite song. First one to stop — drinks!

dares.title: Wink War
dares.action: All girls wink at the same time. Anyone who forgets — drinks!

dares.title: Secret Steal
dares.action: Admit which makeup item you'd secretly steal from a friend. Refuse? Drink!

dares.title: Favorite Dress
dares.action: Describe your favorite dress. Anyone who fumbles — drinks!

dares.title: Friendship Circle Dance
dares.action: Hold hands and dance in a circle for 15 seconds. Break it? Drink!

dares.title: Cheers to Us
dares.action: Say a toast to friendship at the same time. Shortest toast — drinks!

dares.title: Dream Date
dares.action: Describe your dream date out loud. Matching details? Drink together!
